attributes.action: A) Force the CSA to abide by its own rules and to make it accountable and resposible when it doesn't and B) Force the CSA to be equal in its enforcement of child support law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A) The CSA regularly breaks its own rules (eg forcing disclosure of information, illegally obtaining deduction of earnings orders etc). this needs to stop and they should be accountable for it.
B) The CSA will act upon applications made by the DWP much quicker than those made privately.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
